title: what do you think about this font?
content:
Hi,  
I'm new in the forum and I entered here to know the opinion of typograph designers about a font.

(on the link below)  
 [http://s3.amazonaws.com/twitpic/photos/large/42714512.png?AWSAccessKeyId...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051639/http:/s3.amazonaws.com/twitpic/photos/large/42714512.png?AWSAccessKeyId=0ZRYP5X5F6FSMBCCSE82&Expires=1258576753&Signature=oi/j8FVXpE1NqdZRKtjyEuSReVQ%3D "http://s3.amazonaws.com/twitpic/photos/large/42714512.png?AWSAccessKeyId=0ZRYP5X5F6FSMBCCSE82&Expires=1258576753&Signature=oi/j8FVXpE1NqdZRKtjyEuSReVQ%3D")

I've created this for a work about tibetan writing style(just numbering), with not much technical knowledge about it, but a good survey.

I'd like a frank opiion about it and what would suggest to improve it

any opinion is welcome!  
=)  
thanks in advance

Antonio
author: tonibordallo

comments.content:
update

this link above seems not to be owrking,

i hope this one below does

[http://twitpic.com/pfiq8](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051639/http:/twitpic.com/pfiq8 "http://twitpic.com/pfiq8")

please inform to me,ok?
There is no harmony between the figures. I doubt, that it can be improved. I mean, you had to start again. What was your inspiring example?
